price: (Swalehe abwira itsinda ryamuhakanye) ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Kuki mushaka kwihutisha ikibi (ibihano bya Allah) mbere y’icyiza (impuhwe za Allah)? Kuki mudasaba Allah imbabazi kugira ngo mugirirwe impuhwe?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
